definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Santa Loreto Syrah Gran Reserva is made from a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon ans Syrah .
sentences.chinese: 花冠特级珍藏赤西拉是由赤霞珠与西拉混合而成。

sentences.english: Rip all the basil over it, correct the seasoning, and drizzle with good extra-virgin olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 加入撕碎的罗勒，调味，最后淋上特级橄榄油。

sentences.english: Robert Parker says this wine is comparable with a Grand Cru Classe.
sentences.chinese: 酒评人派克指，此酒的质素可媲美特级酒。

sentences.english: The guests consume over 500yuan compliment mixed sushi or tenderloin.
sentences.chinese: 一次性消费满五百元赠送寿司拼盘或特级牛柳一份。

sentences.english: The appellation of "Graves supérieurs" is strictly reserved to sweet white wines.
sentences.chinese: 格拉夫特级，这个级别的命名就是严格指甜白葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Drizzle them with warmed extra virgin olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 将加热过的特级初榨橄榄油淋在上面。

sentences.english: The weakening of the motivation and guidance function also causes the value mismatch.
sentences.chinese: 特级教师制度的激励和导向功能淡化也导致价值错位。

sentences.english: Our school boasts excellent staff, including a number of teachers of distinction.
sentences.chinese: 我校有优秀的教师队伍，其中包括了多名特级教师。

sentences.english: A Gran Reserva Carmenere is characterized by its deep, dark cherry, burgundy red color.
sentences.chinese: 这款特级珍藏卡曼尼呈现出成熟樱桃的深红颜色。

sentences.english: The production is estered from extra grade rosin and pentaerythritol.
sentences.chinese: 本品用季戊四醇与特级松香酯而成。

sentences.english: Silver Medal, Concours Des Grands Vins De France, Macon 2011
sentences.chinese: 2011年法国勃艮第马孔“特级葡萄酒竞赛“银奖。

sentences.english: This well known property has always been considered one of the best Grand Cru of St-Emilion.
sentences.chinese: 此著名的古堡被誉为圣埃米利永产区最好的特级酒庄。

sentences.english: Gran Reserva Carmenere is characterized by its deep, dark cherry, burgundy red color.
sentences.chinese: 这款特级珍藏卡曼尼呈现出成熟樱桃的深红颜色。

sentences.english: The Jiangsu Province construction work group Limited company is the top grade intelligence enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 江苏省建工集团有限公司为特级资质企业。

sentences.english: They proclaimed her a special-grade teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣布她为特级教师。

sentences.english: Super Dragon pound, about as much as Chaya up thirty-six thousand.
sentences.chinese: 一斤特级龙井，约有茶芽达三万六千个之多。

definition: best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
the five visible planets, namely: Mercury 水星, Venus 金星, Mars 火星, Jupiter 木星, Saturn 土星
genuine goods at fair prices/(fig.) genuine/real/true
